Header: DumindaDissanayake appeared before the Presidential Commission to Investigate Corruption and Fraud
Content: Parliamentarian DumindaDissanayake appeared before the Presidential Commission to Investigate Corruption and Fraud. The Presidential Commission is conducting inquiries into the operation of the Ministry of Agriculture in a private building at Rajagiriya when DumindaDissanayake was the Minister of Agriculture. He appeared before the Presidential Commission to make a statement in line with the investigation. Speaking to media, the MP said that he was asked to appear before the committee again on the 10th of this month. Stating on the current political situation, Dissanayake said that a wide political alliance is expected under the leadership of the SLFP in the near future.
